title: Jenna Dewan packs on the PDA with baby-daddy Steve Kazee as he caresses bump at WWE bash
text:
She is expecting his baby.

And Jenna Dewan got cozy with her beau Steve Kazee at the WWE 20th anniversary celebration at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Friday.

Jenna slipped into a flowing jumpsuit that accented her bump, which she placed a hand on as she posed up a storm for the shutterbugs.

The look of love: Jenna Dewan got cozy with her beau Steve Kazee at the WWE 20th anniversary celebration at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Friday

Her outfit featured a plunging neckline that showed off her cleavage as well as the sparkling jeweled necklace she wore to the fete.

Accentuating her unmistakable features with makeup, she wore her wavy dark hair down and balanced on a pair of silver stilettos.

Meanwhile, her silver fox boyfriend was in a Miami chic monochrome button-down shirt that complemented his charcoal slacks.

Making it happen: Jenna slipped into a flowing jumpsuit that accented her bump, which she placed a hand on as she posed up a storm for the shutterbugs

Aglow: Her outfit featured a plunging neckline that showed off her cleavage as well as the sparkling jeweled necklace she wore to the fete

Kicks: Accentuating her unmistakable features with makeup, she wore her wavy dark hair down and balanced on a pair of silver stilettos

The duo got together in the second half of last year and jointly announced her pregnancy last month to People magazine.

'We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!' said the duo, who are expecting Steve's first baby and Jenna's second.

Jenna co-parents her six-year-old daughter Everly Tatum with her estranged husband Channing Tatum, who is now running around with Jessie J.

Meanwhile: Her silver fox boyfriend was in a Miami chic monochrome button-down shirt that complemented his charcoal slacks

The thrill of it all: The duo got together in the second half of last year and jointly announced her pregnancy last month to People magazine

An E! News source said: 'Jenna told Channing that she was pregnant and wanted to make sure he knew before she announced it.'

The insider said Channing, who amicably announced his marital separation jointly with Jenna last April, 'is happy for her and was very supportive.'

Channing and Jenna became an item while filming their 2006 dance movie Step Up and got married at Malibu's Church Estates Vineyards in 2009.
description: She is expecting his baby. And Jenna Dewan got cozy with her beau Steve Kazee at the WWE 20th anniversary celebration at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Friday.
